CustomField.description: If the line item was created from a quote, this links to the original quote line item. A series of unique opportunity line items may point to the same quote line item if the quote line item had a quantity greater than one.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the line item was created from a quote, this links to the original quote line item. A series of unique opportunity line items may point to the same quote line item if the quote line item had a quantity greater than one.
CustomField.label: Related Quote Line
